DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : I. Assess clinical response patient refractory recurrent brain neoplasm treat carmustine , streptozocin , mercaptopurine .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study Carmustine , Streptozocin , Mercaptopurine Refractory Recurrent Brain Neoplasms
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients receive mercaptopurine IV day 1-3 , carmustine continuous infusion day 3-5 , streptozocin IV 20 minute day 2-5 . Patients receive treatment every 42 day , 4 course . Completion date provide represent completion date grant per OOPD record
